recommendations.title: Agar Tum Saath Ho
recommendations.mood_match: This song perfectly captures the feeling of vulnerability and yearning for support, a common undertone of anxiety. The raw emotion in the vocals expresses a desperate need for connection amidst inner turmoil.

recommendations.title: Khairiyat
recommendations.mood_match: With its melancholic yet soothing melody, 'Khairiyat' resonates with a gentle sense of concern and introspection. It's about hoping for well-being, which can reflect the quiet worry an anxious mind often carries.

recommendations.title: Iktara
recommendations.artist: Amit Trivedi, Kavita Seth, Amitabh Bhattacharya
recommendations.mood_match: This song offers a reflective and introspective mood. Its serene yet slightly melancholic tone can help quiet a restless mind, making one ponder life's journey and search for a sense of belonging or purpose.

recommendations.title: Phir Le Aya Dil (Reprise)
recommendations.mood_match: The soulful and yearning quality of this track speaks to the heart. It's about fate and longing, evoking a gentle ache that can acknowledge anxious feelings while offering a sense of poetic acceptance.

recommendations.title: Moh Moh Ke Dhaage (Female)
recommendations.artist: Anu Malik, Monali Thakur, Varun Grover
recommendations.mood_match: Delicate and tender, this song evokes a quiet sense of hope mixed with vulnerability. Its gentle melody and heartfelt lyrics can be a comforting embrace for an anxious mind, acknowledging soft emotions.

recommendations.title: Channa Mereya (From "Ae Dil Hai Mushkil")
recommendations.mood_match: While a heartbreak anthem, its intense emotional depth and the powerful expression of longing and pain resonate with a profound sense of emotional turbulence, a feeling often akin to anxiety.

recommendations.title: Kala Chashma Club Mix DJ Notorious
recommendations.artist: Amar Arshi, Neha Kakkar, Badshah, Indeep Bakshi
recommendations.mood_match: This song is an ultimate party anthem that instantly brings out a playful, celebratory mood with its catchy beats and vibrant energy, perfect for dancing.

recommendations.title: Aankh Marey
recommendations.artist: Neha Kakkar, Mika Singh, Kumar Sanu
recommendations.mood_match: An incredibly high-energy track that guarantees to make you tap your feet. Its infectious rhythm and powerful vocals embody pure, unadulterated joy and zest for life.

recommendations.title: Makhna
recommendations.artist: Tanishk Bagchi, Asees Kaur, Yasser Desai
recommendations.mood_match: With its laid-back yet upbeat vibe, this song is perfect for a cheerful, adventurous mood. It evokes feelings of freedom and lighthearted fun, ideal for a happy road trip or just chilling out.

recommendations.title: Badtameez Dil
recommendations.mood_match: A timeless classic that screams youthful exuberance and carefree happiness. Its infectious energy and vibrant composition are perfect for celebrating life and letting loose.

recommendations.title: Gallan Goodiyaan
recommendations.artist: Yashita Sharma, Manish Kumar Tipu, Farhan Akhtar, Shankar Mahadevan, Sukhwinder Singh, Shankar-Ehsaan-Loy
recommendations.mood_match: This song embodies family celebration and joyous togetherness. Its warm, lively melody and heartwarming lyrics create a feeling of collective happiness and bonding.

recommendations.title: Chaiyya Chaiyya
recommendations.mood_match: An iconic track that symbolizes unstoppable energy and a thrilling sense of adventure. It's an empowering and exhilarating song that makes you feel alive and ready for anything.
